This allows web browsers to not only request resources from backend servers, but also real-time information from browsers of other users.This enables applications such as video conferencing, file transfer, chat, or desktop sharing without the need of either internal or external plugins. SAAS

desc: It's hard to explain in words but.I designed a great simple one handed game for pre smart phone. The entrance of the smart phone made my game look poor graphically although it worked very well it suffered in the smart phone path of  high end graphics and game play...I wish to reinvent this game to smart phone standards. It is much more advanced than say candy crush and Tetris. It has a global league supporting website (yet to be built or re built) that will use GPS to offer specific or global leader boards with up to a million dollar first prise or highest score...The most challenges is also a key role in making this game viral on social networks and the like due to the forwarding of the game play.I can describe it best as Tetris meets Candy Crush with a little chess like thinking.I have the old working files and website that was built 10 years ago but this is a guide. As I say the graphics are key to its success.I don't really have a budget but a fair price for outstanding work which I see from some of you listed are more than capable of producing.Well, that's about it as I don't want the world to know what I am doing. Of corse I will explain all and as much supporting code and images as you need to build this game.I thank you for reading my what I assume is a quite pathetic attempt to explain the job in hand.I have a huge amount of other works I also wish to produce asap. A shopping app. A complaint app.I worked in the film industry for 15 years with the most well known producers which I also have a fully interactive book and film including web site to produce as soon as I find the right person or team to help me...Many ThanksArron

desc: Responsive Website/Native iOS & Android app designerWe are looking for an outstanding responsive website/Native iOS & Android app designer for a startup company. The developer/team will be responsible for wire-framing, stunning UI/UX, coding and responsive website. The web/app must have innovative design with a potential to reach top lifestyle app category on app store. This web/app must:•	Integrated seamlessly with payment gateway to handle (debit customer/credit service provider)•	Integrate with third party verification platform for service provider•	Be able to report customer payment location based on zip code to send them periodic thank you letterYou can propose solutions to develop sound architecture and server setup. You’re free to propose solutions to make the UX better. Timelines are strict. Similar web/app that should give you an idea of what we trying to do:•	UBER or other C2B service providerThe GUI combines one simple screen with three roles to log into depending on who is signing up•	Customer•	Professional•	AdminDeployment and Testing:•	App packages should be shared with us•	Apps must be technically compliant to Apple store & Google Play store and submitted.•	Rejected app should be fix deficiencies to be resubmitted.•	Source code to be shared with us once mutual liabilities are fulfilled (IP rights & Ownership remain with us)Additional information:•	Developer should be familiar with Geo-location using zip codes and assigned school district in US and Canada. This will be part of interview question and how developer will find this information as part of development efforts•	Compression strategy as part of functionality of the app/web as customer records or takes picture of requirement•	Online chatting functionalities for C2B relationshipPayment:•	Based on High-level Milestoneo	Deliver wireframe/mockup - Start coding (complete app design (UI/UX and graphics) -Logo, Graphic Design and multimedia -o	Architecture, Backend API, Frontend Apps Alpha and beta releaseo	Testing for bugs, errors based on our feedback.Integration Point knowledge:•	You will be required to clarify integration point knowledge and what you have done with payment processor in the past•	You will be required to clarify how you will be integrating for backup verification of “B” component of C2B business modelPlatform: Development and Deployment on AWS, integration using API to connect to payment gateway like Stripe, and other third-party verification toolsSkills requiredAndroid App Development App Store Apple Xcode CSS Ecommerce Platform Development Go Graphic Design HTML5 Java Logo Design Marketing Strategy MySQL Administration MySQL Programming Node.js Objective-C PHP Swift User Interface Design User Experience Design, AWS platform, Experience with Docker
